text: Nelson Lincoln (April 20, 1914 - March 7, 2000) was an American sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths Category:American male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the United States Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Medford, Massachusetts Category:Pan American Games medalists in shooting Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Shooters at the 1959 Pan American Games
title: Nelson Lincoln
